articles.author: Jon Brown
articles.title: Kamala Harris denounces European explorers for ushering in 'wave of devastation' for Native Americans - Fox News
articles.description: Vice President Kamala Harris denigrated the European explorers who discovered the Americas during a Tuesday speech at the National Congress of American Indians 78th Annual Convention.
articles.content:

articles.title: Belarus' Lukashenko is accused of creating Europe's latest migration crisis - NPR
articles.description: Poland has stopped some 16,000 migrants crossing its border from Belarus since August, and accuses Belarus' authoritarian regime of facilitating illegal migration into the European Union.
articles.content: Migrants are seated, after crossing the border from Belarus into Poland in the village of Usnarz Gorny, Poland, in September. An estimated 16,000 migrants have been stopped by Poland's border patrol … [+9042 chars]

articles.title: Northern Lights: 9 amazing images captured of last night's Aurora Borealis - Independent.ie
articles.description: Monday night saw a solar flare reach Earth and the result was an incredible lightshow in the form of the Northern Lights, or Aurora Borealis, for many across Canada, Northern USA, Northern Europe and Russia.
